transformed_texts:
The Catholic Church must change some of its views. The Church is losing followers. This is because the Church does not accept many things. For example, it does not support gay marriage, abortion, or birth control. The Church has strong views on these subjects. However, its views are old-fashioned in some ways.

If the Church changes its views, it will not lose more followers. Many people are turning against the Church because of its views on these issues. They do not agree with the Church on these subjects. The Church thinks it has the right view, but others disagree.

The Church is against abortion. If you support abortion, you may not want to join the Church. The same is true for gay marriage. If you support gay marriage, you may not want to join a Church that does not agree with you.

I do not see why priests cannot be married. The Church says priests are married to God, but everyone else has a family and job. Priests can love God and their family. They can have a balance between work and life.

The Church must change its views on some issues. It must be more accepting of different ideas. If it does not change, it will lose more followers.

I think gay marriage is a good idea. I don't think people are born straight or gay by choice. They are born that way. So, I don't think gay people should be blamed for their sexual orientation.

I don't think it's fair to say a man and a woman can get married, but two people of the same sex can't. That's not right. People should be free to love and marry whoever they want.

The government should not decide who can get married. Marriage is a personal choice. If two people love each other, they should be allowed to marry. It's not the government's business.

Gay people should not be punished for being who they are. They should be treated with respect. Everyone is different, and that's okay.

The government has more important things to worry about than who gets married. They should focus on keeping us safe and helping people who need it. Marriage is a personal choice, and the government should not get involved.

I think gay marriage should be legal. 

There is no good reason not to. 

Some people think that gay couples are a threat to the traditional family. But this is not true. 

Gay couples are different, and so are straight couples. They are like two sides of the same coin. 

Each side is not better or worse than the other. 

In fact, gay couples have the same rights as straight couples. They should have the same rights as well. 

For example, if you are in a gay relationship, your partner may not be able to visit you in the hospital. This is not fair. 

Many studies have shown that gay couples have the same rates of success as straight couples. They have the same factors that keep their relationships strong. 

The main issue is that some people do not want gay couples to get married in a church. But this is not the same as a marriage certificate from the government. 

If the church and government are separate, this should not be a problem. 

In some countries, a civil union is allowed but not marriage. This is like being separate but unequal. 

Gay couples have the same kind of relationship as straight couples. They play the same roles and have the same responsibilities. 

Some people worry about adoption and community issues. They think that gay couples will affect their community. 

But the truth is that children of gay couples are the same as children of straight couples. They need love and care, not because of their parents' sexual orientation. 

In some places, like New York City, there are special schools for children of gay parents. This is because they have been treated poorly in public schools. 

But it's not the parents' fault. It's the fault of the people who treat them poorly. 

The government should be involved in this issue. They should make gay marriage legal in every state. 

President Bush has strong views on this issue, but they are based on his religion. This is not a good reason to make a law. 

The government should not enforce one group's morality on the whole country. This is unfair and hypocritical. 

Some people are against gay marriage because they think gay people are damaged or abnormal. But this is not true. The American Psychological Association says so. 

We should listen to facts and research, not just what our neighbors or friends think. 

If we do, we will see that gay couples are just like straight couples. They deserve the same rights.

I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer. 

Just because a medicine is against the law does not mean it has good qualities. 

I think it should not be available for everyone to use. But I think it can be helpful if a doctor uses it to treat a sickness. 

Some medicines that are against the law are used in pharmacies. For example, oxycodone and Vicodin. They are controlled because they can be bad if not used correctly. 

But because they have good qualities, we use them in the pharmacy. If we think marijuana has good qualities, we should use it too. 

I do not think marijuana is like alcohol. If you use too much of either one, bad things can happen. 

However, we could make marijuana legal, but not all at once. We should make people understand that it is not bad first. Then maybe people will use it correctly. 

People think marijuana is bad because it is against the law. But it is not as bad as heroin or cocaine. If we change the way people think about marijuana, they might use it correctly. And it could be helpful for sicknesses.

I think the church has changed a lot in the 21st century. It's not as strict as it used to be. When I was younger, I went to church every Sunday. I would wear nice dresses, matching shoes, and a purse. I went to a private school, and I saw my friends there on weekends. We would attend a long church service.

Now, the church has a shorter service, only 30 minutes. People dress more casually, even on Sundays. In the summer, some people wear beach clothes. Families sometimes come in late. The church has become more casual.

The biggest change I noticed is how people dress. Even in the morning services, people wear jeans and khakis. It's a big change from when I was younger.

I don't know much about the church's politics. But I think the church changed for the better.

Regarding the accusations against Catholic priests, I think some bad things could not have been prevented. There are married men who are pedophiles. Even if they were allowed to get married, it wouldn't stop them from being pedophiles. It's not because they are allowed or not allowed to get married.

Some religions allow married priests or ministers. For example, the Seventh-day Adventist Church has married ministers. If someone wants to be a priest and get married, they might choose a different religion.

I think people are born with their sexuality, and it's based on genetics. You can't change it, even through marriage. If someone is a pedophile, it will show. If the church knew about the problem and tried to hide it, they should be ashamed. But I don't think they knew in all cases.

I don't have any other thoughts about the Catholic Church.

I was okay with the idea at first. But then the September 11th attacks happened. The United States went to war in Iraq. I think we used false reasons to go to war. The Bush administration said Saddam Hussein had weapons of mass destruction. But this was not true.

I was angry when I found out the government lied to the people. Even Colin Powell said he was not sure about the evidence when he was presenting it to the UN. This is wrong. It is a serious mistake to lie to the people.

I think the Bush administration does not respect the US Constitution. They have been trying to make it less important since the September 11th attacks. They wanted to go to war from the start.

A former government official said that George Bush wanted to go to war with Iraq because of a personal reason. He wanted to get rid of Saddam Hussein. This is not a good reason for war.

I think the war has gone on too long. If we leave now, the country might fall into a civil war and many more people will die. But I do not think it is a good idea to stay either. The US and the UN are trying to get other countries in the area to help Iraq. But this might cause more problems in the long run.

Iraq's government is not working well. The Parliament is not effective and the Prime Minister does not have control. A strong leader, Muqtada al-Sadr, has 20 seats in the Parliament and is causing problems. It is hard to control the government because of these problems.

I do not have a good solution to this problem.

I am asked about the War in Iraq. 

At first, I do not know what to say. The war was not declared. It was like getting back at Iraq because they hurt us on 9/11. 

But now, I think it is pointless. We are there to build democracy. We want them to be like us. We also want their oil. 

But it is not fair to stay. It makes everyone unhappy. If we stay, we must build democracy. This takes a long time. If we leave, they will be unhappy with us. They will have to start over.

I do not know much about this. It is hard to talk about. 

I think the war should continue, but it should not be called a war anymore. We use guns to show we are strong. But we did not declare war. This is not right.

We should help Iraq, but it is wasting our resources. President Bush is unhappy because of the war. He will be remembered as a bad president.

It is hard to say what I want. Some people I know have sons and daughters in Iraq. I want them to come home. But if we leave, it will be hard for Iraq. They have a different culture. We will try to change them. This will make it worse.

I think the war will go on for a long time. It is like a never-ending problem. 

That is my opinion.

I don't think it's right for the government to make something legal or not. The constitution says we have separation of church and state. This means the church and government should be separate.

The constitution is clear. It says the church and state should be separate. This means the government should not try to control what the church does. Trying to do this would be against the constitution.

Some people who are in government want to make it illegal. I think this is not fair. They are choosing one church's beliefs over another. Most Catholics and Christians do not want this law. Only a few places support it.

The government should not decide what the church can and cannot do. The government and church should be separate. This is a key part of the constitution. It allows for freedom of religion in the United States.

People in government want to make a new law. I think this is not right. It would go against what is already written in the constitution. And I think it would be the only law that takes away freedom, not gives it.

I do not think the government should be involved in this issue. The president and government are pushing for this law because of their personal beliefs. This is not fair. The church should decide this, not the government. There is no good reason for this law. It's just because of personal opinions.

I don't see how this law would help the economy. It could actually help society. It's up to the church to decide what is right, not the government.

I think I have said everything I need to say.

The Iraq war is a very difficult topic. I do not think the government was honest with the American people about the reasons for going to war in Iraq. They made it seem like Iraq was connected to the terrorist attacks of September 11th, but it was not clear. This was not true.

I do not like war. In fact, I am against war in most cases. The invasion of Iraq in 2003 was a bad idea. It was similar to the Vietnam War. The US government did not think about what would happen after they removed the Iraqi government.

Many American soldiers died in Iraq. This is very sad. The US government did not think about how to help the country after they took away its government. They wanted to put a new government in place.

The US government tried to put a democratic government in Iraq. But this is a difficult process. It took many years for democracy to come to the US. The US government made it seem easy, but it is not.

It is hard to decide what to do about the war in Iraq. Some people wanted the US to stay and finish what it started. But many American soldiers have died. We took away the Iraqi government and their way of life. Now, it is hard to leave.

There is another reason the US went to war with Iraq. It is because of oil. The US needs oil to run its country. This is a big reason for many of the decisions made by the government.

I hope the war in Iraq ends soon. I hope there will be peace soon. But it does not seem likely.

I am for gay marriage. I have always been. It is a personal choice, and it is not up to others to decide. 

Research shows that being gay may be in our genes, not just a choice. This means people should not be punished for something they cannot control.

I think it is not fair to deny gay people the right to get married. It is not a government problem, but a personal one. 

In my neighborhood, there are gay couples living like any other family. They walk their dogs and live their lives like everyone else. 

The government should not decide what marriage means. It is up to each person to decide who they love and want to marry. 

Some scientists say that being gay may be caused by a chemical in the brain. It is not just a matter of how people are raised. 

If a man and a woman can get married without anyone knowing, why can't two people of the same sex? It should be a private matter, not a public issue. 

I do not think the government should decide who can get married. It is a personal choice.

When you put something on the internet, it is public. Anyone can see it. You cannot keep it secret. I know this because I am an RA. I have had to deal with this problem before.

When you put something on the internet, it can affect how people think of you. If you talk about something bad, like violence, someone might say something. Then the school might find out about it.

The internet is public. Everyone can see it. If you are friends with someone on Myspace, you will see their bulletin. But it was not the school that saw it. Someone else told the school.

The school has to take action. They cannot ignore it. They do not know if it is a joke or serious. It could be like a science experiment gone wrong. Or it could be very serious.

This happened at my school. Someone overheard someone saying something. They called the school, and we found out who said it. We looked at their Facebook account and saw some things that might be jokes, but became serious.

When you put something on the internet, you cannot be sure who will see it. If you do not want people to see it, do not put it there.

School officials should not be friends with students on Facebook or Myspace. But if a student tells them something, they must act. If there is danger, they must take it seriously.

School officials should not listen to phone conversations or texts. But if someone tells them something, it is different. Teachers should not make fake accounts on Facebook or Myspace to be friends with students. That is not right.

I do not want to know if my residents are doing things they should not do. I do not want to see their pictures on Facebook. I do not want to have to deal with it.

I think the war has gone on too long. 
The original reason was to bring democracy to another country. 
But now, I think we are fighting for the sake of fighting. 
We want to show that we are a powerful country. 
This is not a good reason for a war. 

The conflict began because of George Bush's father and Saddam Hussein. 
But even if our goal was to give democracy to a country with no fair government, that would be a good reason. 
However, personal problems are not a good reason for war. 

I think we made our point early on. 
But the war has lasted for many years. 
This is too long. 

If our goal was to stop a dictator, that would be a good reason for the war. 
But now, our reason for fighting seems unclear. 
It seems like we are fighting because we do not want to stop fighting. 

I think the war has gone on long enough. 
The country we are helping will have to take care of itself soon. 
We have our own problems, like poverty and poor roads. 
We should spend our money on these problems, not on a long war. 

We are spending a lot of money on the war. 
This money could be used for better things, like healthcare and education. 
Our own citizens are being killed in the war, and we are not winning.

I want to ask a question to make things clear.

You see, someone found information on the internet that stopped something bad from happening.  This person looked at a website like Myspace where people put their personal information. If you put something on the internet, it's like sending a message to many people. They can see it.

On Myspace, you need to be a friend with someone to see their information. But if you are their friend, you have given them permission to see your information. So, you have to understand that many people can see what you put on the internet.

If someone saw something on the internet and stopped something bad from happening, that's good. But it's not easy to find that information. You can't have one person looking at everyone's Myspace to stop bad things. That would be unfair to some people.

It's hard to decide if it's right to have someone's job to look at people's Myspace. It depends on why they were looking. Were they looking for something specific or just randomly?

I have a Facebook account, and it bothers me that there are people who can see my information. I know a person on TV showed how easy it is to get information from the internet. He got someone's screen name and talked to her on instant messenger. I wouldn't meet someone like that, but I have had people in my class who know my screen name and contact me.

It's hard to control what you put on the internet. You want to be able to communicate with friends, but you also don't want strangers to see your information. I try to limit what I put on Facebook, but it's hard.

My roommate told me that her high school banned students from having Myspace. I'm not sure if that's right. Can the school tell students what they can and can't do on the internet?

The Iraq War is a big problem. I want to talk about it. I feel strange saying I was against it from the beginning. Most people in the world think it was a bad idea. 

Polls show the same thing. Most people in the United States, Iraq, and all over the world think it was a bad idea. Even most of the U.S. troops in Iraq think it was a bad idea. They want to leave within a year.

The Iraq War has been a disaster since the beginning. It was already a problem before the U.S. got involved. Now, leaving will also be difficult. There is a big cultural difference between the United States and the Middle East. It is hard for the U.S. government to understand and fix this problem.

The U.S. government wanted to bring democracy to Iraq, but this is not what the Iraqis wanted. Saddam Hussein was a bad man, but the U.S. should have thought about the pros and cons before invading Iraq.

I do not think it is good for the U.S. to stay in Iraq. The administration may have some ideas for why we should stay, but I do not agree. If we leave slowly, that is okay. But, I do not see a good reason for us to stay in Iraq.

Most Iraqis think the U.S. should leave within a year. If we ask them, they will say what they want. If something goes wrong, we can say it is not our fault. We will be the good guys if we leave now. At least we will be better than we are now.

There is still a problem with men and women being treated unfairly in the United States. This problem exists in many areas of work.

Not just for women, but also for men. The kind of work a person does affects how they are treated. In some areas, women have a harder time getting ahead. This is because of a idea that men are usually in charge. But this is not always true.

Even if a woman has the qualifications and skills for a job, she may not be chosen for it. This is because of how people think women should be treated. But it's not just women who face this problem.

Men also face issues. For example, in the fashion industry, men who are interested in fashion are often not taken seriously. This is because people think men who like fashion are not 'normal'. But this is changing.

Some men are now staying home to take care of their children, which is not common. People often look down on them because they think men should be the ones working to make money. But this is not always true.

Change is slow. But we are making progress. More women are becoming leaders and getting accepted in business. This is a good thing.

We need to show the good qualities of people who are often treated unfairly. We should not force people to accept change, but let them see the good things about these individuals. This way, people will be more likely to accept them.

We have made a lot of progress, but change takes time. We should be patient and continue to work towards making things fairer. We are at a good point now, where people are starting to accept change.

Other problems exist, like people being treated unfairly because of where they are from or how they speak. This is another example of how people are treated unfairly because of how they are different.

My understanding is that marijuana was not made legal.  It was decriminalized.  This means it is no longer a serious crime.  Instead, it is like getting a traffic ticket.  You get in trouble, but not arrested.

If you get a marijuana ticket, it can affect your life.  It can affect your job or how you look in front of a judge.  Usually, having a drug charge is bad.  But when something is decriminalized, these bad effects are not as bad.

Some people think decriminalizing marijuana is not a good idea.  They think it costs too much money to arrest and put people in jail.  It also costs money to go to court.  But some places are willing to make this change.  They think it will save money.

In Denver, people are more open-minded.  They think it is okay to decriminalize marijuana.  This city has more money now to help people.  They can spend it on education, food for the homeless, and other important things.

I think it's good to decriminalize marijuana.  It's not good to have it just anywhere.  There are many reasons for this.  One reason is money.  Another reason is that some people might smoke and drive.  This is not good.  Many people think smoking marijuana is taboo.  We should not have it in public.

Alcohol can be bad for people.  It can affect their driving.  But marijuana can affect how people live their lives.  Some people can use it and be fine.  Others cannot.  It depends on the person.

We cannot say that one substance is always bad.  Everyone reacts differently.  Some people can control themselves.  Others cannot.  We should be careful when we talk about substances.

I agree. 
There are good reasons for the Catholic Church's old customs. 
They do many things the same way for a long time. 
This is good because it shows respect for tradition. 
However, it is also important to be flexible and change when necessary.

The Catholic Church says its followers must go to church every week. 
They have rules for everything. 
Sometimes, it seems like the Church does not accept people who do not follow the rules perfectly. 
It also does not accept people of other religions. 
For example, my mom was an Episcopalian and my dad was an Episcopalian. 
The Catholic Church would not marry us because my dad was not Catholic.

This is not showing love and acceptance of others. 
The Catholic Church says to love others, but it does not act that way. 
Many Catholic rules tell people to do one thing, but the Church does not follow those rules.

I do not think allowing priests to be married would stop them from doing bad things. 
People who hurt children will do it anyway. 
They are hurting children, not grown-ups. 
So, marriage or not, they will still hurt children. 
I do not think allowing priests to be married would make a difference.

I am not sure about this issue. I do not know if one side is right and the other is wrong. This is a very difficult topic. It is hard to decide without hurting anyone's feelings.

The separation of church and state is a big problem. Defining marriage is also hard. Some people think marriage is between a man and a woman. Others think it is between two people who love each other.

If marriage is a sacrament, the government should not make rules about it. But if marriage is not a sacrament, the government should give tax breaks to married couples.

I think marriage should be considered a civil union. It is two people who love each other. The government should not worry about what kind of marriage it is.

If all the states agree on this issue, the government should make it a federal law. But a constitutional amendment to ban gay marriage is not a good idea. It is not important enough to change the constitution.

In simple words, we should not change the constitution to ban gay marriage. Two people who love each other should have the same rights as anyone else.

I was raised in a Christian home. But I have friends who are gay. This makes the issue of homosexuality unclear for me. I do not agree with every aspect of the gay lifestyle. However, I think it should be legal. It is not a matter for the whole country. Each state should decide for itself.

Some states are democratic, and some are Republican. Democratic states usually support gay marriage. If you choose to live in a state that allows gay marriage, it is your choice. If the state decides to make gay marriage legal, you should accept the decision. This is because you chose to live there.

I think homosexuals should have the same rights as heterosexuals. So, each state should decide whether to make gay marriage legal.

I already said this. But I want to say it again. The president should not decide for the whole country. Each state should make its own decision.

George Bush is against gay marriage. But he cannot decide for all the states. He does not live in every state. It is not his decision to make.

Some things should be decided by each state. The president will not be in office forever. If a new president wants to change the law, it will just go back and forth. Each state should make its own decision. They will have to live with the result.

Myspace is a public website. If you post something on it, everyone can see it. School officials have the right to see it because they can access it from their homes. 

Imagine someone is posting something on Myspace that could cause a school shooting. School officials should be able to see that to prevent it. They have a responsibility to make sure the school is safe.

School officials might go on the internet to see if students are doing things they shouldn't be doing. They do this to keep the school safe. Some people think this is an invasion of privacy. But I don't think so. If it helps keep the school safe, it's okay.

It's easier to express yourself when you write. But on Myspace, everything you post is public. It's not a good idea to say things you don't want others to see. Once you post something on the internet, it's there forever.

School officials should not just go on the internet to catch students. But if they have a good reason, like to make the school safer, it's okay. When parents drop off their children at school, they expect it to be a safe place. School officials have a responsibility to make that happen.

The school had to prepare for emergencies, like school shootings, by doing drills. This is to keep the school safe. School officials were doing the same thing in this case. They were trying to prevent bad things from happening.

The purpose of the school officials going on the internet was to make the school a safer place. They wanted to prevent something like the Columbine school shooting from happening.

I was for the war at first. It was because I was affected by 9/11. I wanted to fight back. But then I thought about it more. I realized we were not ready for war. We did not have a plan. We just went in without thinking about the long-term effects.

I think we made a mistake. Going to war was not the right decision. The people in that country are fighting each other. They cannot fight us if they are busy fighting themselves. Our being there is not helping. 

I do not care about what happens in that country anymore. They are not like us. They fight in a different way. It is not like our war. They are not trying to make their country better. They just want us to leave.

I think we were not thinking clearly. We were angry and wanted revenge. President Bush declared war on Iraq. I understand why he did it. The people wanted to fight back. But we did not plan well. We did not know what to do when we got there.

We should have made a better plan. We should have thought about what would happen after the war. We did not have unity. We did not know what we were doing. That would have helped us.

I do not think we can change those people. They are always going to be like that. 

We are not making progress. We made some progress, but not enough. I think we should leave. Once we leave, their country will fall apart. We cannot stay there forever. We are hurting ourselves by staying. We should just leave.

transformed_texts:
The Catholic Church must change some of its views. The Church is losing followers. This is because the Church does not accept many things. For example, it does not support gay marriage, abortion, or birth control. The Church has strong views on these subjects. However, its views are old-fashioned in some ways.

If the Church changes its views, it will not lose more followers. Many people are turning against the Church because of its views on these issues. They do not agree with the Church on these subjects. The Church thinks it has the right view, but others disagree.

The Church is against abortion. If you support abortion, you may not want to join the Church. The same is true for gay marriage. If you support gay marriage, you may not want to join a Church that does not agree with you.

I do not see why priests cannot be married. The Church says priests are married to God, but everyone else has a family and job. Priests can love God and their family. They can have a balance between work and life.

The Church must change its views on some issues. It must be more accepting of different ideas. If it does not change, it will lose more followers.

I think gay marriage is a good idea. I don't think people are born straight or gay by choice. They are born that way. So, I don't think gay people should be blamed for their sexual orientation.

I don't think it's fair to say a man and a woman can get married, but two people of the same sex can't. That's not right. People should be free to love and marry whoever they want.

The government should not decide who can get married. Marriage is a personal choice. If two people love each other, they should be allowed to marry. It's not the government's business.

Gay people should not be punished for being who they are. They should be treated with respect. Everyone is different, and that's okay.

The government has more important things to worry about than who gets married. They should focus on keeping us safe and helping people who need it. Marriage is a personal choice, and the government should not get involved.

I think gay marriage should be legal. 

There is no good reason not to. 

Some people think that gay couples are a threat to the traditional family. But this is not true. 

Gay couples are different, and so are straight couples. They are like two sides of the same coin. 

Each side is not better or worse than the other. 

In fact, gay couples have the same rights as straight couples. They should have the same rights as well. 

For example, if you are in a gay relationship, your partner may not be able to visit you in the hospital. This is not fair. 

Many studies have shown that gay couples have the same rates of success as straight couples. They have the same factors that keep their relationships strong. 

The main issue is that some people do not want gay couples to get married in a church. But this is not the same as a marriage certificate from the government. 

If the church and government are separate, this should not be a problem. 

In some countries, a civil union is allowed but not marriage. This is like being separate but unequal. 

Gay couples have the same kind of relationship as straight couples. They play the same roles and have the same responsibilities. 

Some people worry about adoption and community issues. They think that gay couples will affect their community. 

But the truth is that children of gay couples are the same as children of straight couples. They need love and care, not because of their parents' sexual orientation. 

In some places, like New York City, there are special schools for children of gay parents. This is because they have been treated poorly in public schools. 

But it's not the parents' fault. It's the fault of the people who treat them poorly. 

The government should be involved in this issue. They should make gay marriage legal in every state. 

President Bush has strong views on this issue, but they are based on his religion. This is not a good reason to make a law. 

The government should not enforce one group's morality on the whole country. This is unfair and hypocritical. 

Some people are against gay marriage because they think gay people are damaged or abnormal. But this is not true. The American Psychological Association says so. 

We should listen to facts and research, not just what our neighbors or friends think. 

If we do, we will see that gay couples are just like straight couples. They deserve the same rights.

I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer. 

Just because a medicine is against the law does not mean it has good qualities. 

I think it should not be available for everyone to use. But I think it can be helpful if a doctor uses it to treat a sickness. 

Some medicines that are against the law are used in pharmacies. For example, oxycodone and Vicodin. They are controlled because they can be bad if not used correctly. 

But because they have good qualities, we use them in the pharmacy. If we think marijuana has good qualities, we should use it too. 

I do not think marijuana is like alcohol. If you use too much of either one, bad things can happen. 

However, we could make marijuana legal, but not all at once. We should make people understand that it is not bad first. Then maybe people will use it correctly. 

People think marijuana is bad because it is against the law. But it is not as bad as heroin or cocaine. If we change the way people think about marijuana, they might use it correctly. And it could be helpful for sicknesses.

I think the church has changed a lot in the 21st century. It's not as strict as it used to be. When I was younger, I went to church every Sunday. I would wear nice dresses, matching shoes, and a purse. I went to a private school, and I saw my friends there on weekends. We would attend a long church service.

Now, the church has a shorter service, only 30 minutes. People dress more casually, even on Sundays. In the summer, some people wear beach clothes. Families sometimes come in late. The church has become more casual.

The biggest change I noticed is how people dress. Even in the morning services, people wear jeans and khakis. It's a big change from when I was younger.

I don't know much about the church's politics. But I think the church changed for the better.

Regarding the accusations against Catholic priests, I think some bad things could not have been prevented. There are married men who are pedophiles. Even if they were allowed to get married, it wouldn't stop them from being pedophiles. It's not because they are allowed or not allowed to get married.

Some religions allow married priests or ministers. For example, the Seventh-day Adventist Church has married ministers. If someone wants to be a priest and get married, they might choose a different religion.

I think people are born with their sexuality, and it's based on genetics. You can't change it, even through marriage. If someone is a pedophile, it will show. If the church knew about the problem and tried to hide it, they should be ashamed. But I don't think they knew in all cases.

I don't have any other thoughts about the Catholic Church.

I was okay with the idea at first. But then the September 11th attacks happened. The United States went to war in Iraq. I think we used false reasons to go to war. The Bush administration said Saddam Hussein had weapons of mass destruction. But this was not true.

I was angry when I found out the government lied to the people. Even Colin Powell said he was not sure about the evidence when he was presenting it to the UN. This is wrong. It is a serious mistake to lie to the people.

I think the Bush administration does not respect the US Constitution. They have been trying to make it less important since the September 11th attacks. They wanted to go to war from the start.

A former government official said that George Bush wanted to go to war with Iraq because of a personal reason. He wanted to get rid of Saddam Hussein. This is not a good reason for war.

I think the war has gone on too long. If we leave now, the country might fall into a civil war and many more people will die. But I do not think it is a good idea to stay either. The US and the UN are trying to get other countries in the area to help Iraq. But this might cause more problems in the long run.

Iraq's government is not working well. The Parliament is not effective and the Prime Minister does not have control. A strong leader, Muqtada al-Sadr, has 20 seats in the Parliament and is causing problems. It is hard to control the government because of these problems.

I do not have a good solution to this problem.

I am asked about the War in Iraq. 

At first, I do not know what to say. The war was not declared. It was like getting back at Iraq because they hurt us on 9/11. 

But now, I think it is pointless. We are there to build democracy. We want them to be like us. We also want their oil. 

But it is not fair to stay. It makes everyone unhappy. If we stay, we must build democracy. This takes a long time. If we leave, they will be unhappy with us. They will have to start over.

I do not know much about this. It is hard to talk about. 

I think the war should continue, but it should not be called a war anymore. We use guns to show we are strong. But we did not declare war. This is not right.

We should help Iraq, but it is wasting our resources. President Bush is unhappy because of the war. He will be remembered as a bad president.

It is hard to say what I want. Some people I know have sons and daughters in Iraq. I want them to come home. But if we leave, it will be hard for Iraq. They have a different culture. We will try to change them. This will make it worse.

I think the war will go on for a long time. It is like a never-ending problem. 

That is my opinion.

I don't think it's right for the government to make something legal or not. The constitution says we have separation of church and state. This means the church and government should be separate.

The constitution is clear. It says the church and state should be separate. This means the government should not try to control what the church does. Trying to do this would be against the constitution.

Some people who are in government want to make it illegal. I think this is not fair. They are choosing one church's beliefs over another. Most Catholics and Christians do not want this law. Only a few places support it.

The government should not decide what the church can and cannot do. The government and church should be separate. This is a key part of the constitution. It allows for freedom of religion in the United States.

People in government want to make a new law. I think this is not right. It would go against what is already written in the constitution. And I think it would be the only law that takes away freedom, not gives it.

I do not think the government should be involved in this issue. The president and government are pushing for this law because of their personal beliefs. This is not fair. The church should decide this, not the government. There is no good reason for this law. It's just because of personal opinions.

I don't see how this law would help the economy. It could actually help society. It's up to the church to decide what is right, not the government.

I think I have said everything I need to say.

The Iraq war is a very difficult topic. I do not think the government was honest with the American people about the reasons for going to war in Iraq. They made it seem like Iraq was connected to the terrorist attacks of September 11th, but it was not clear. This was not true.

I do not like war. In fact, I am against war in most cases. The invasion of Iraq in 2003 was a bad idea. It was similar to the Vietnam War. The US government did not think about what would happen after they removed the Iraqi government.

Many American soldiers died in Iraq. This is very sad. The US government did not think about how to help the country after they took away its government. They wanted to put a new government in place.

The US government tried to put a democratic government in Iraq. But this is a difficult process. It took many years for democracy to come to the US. The US government made it seem easy, but it is not.

It is hard to decide what to do about the war in Iraq. Some people wanted the US to stay and finish what it started. But many American soldiers have died. We took away the Iraqi government and their way of life. Now, it is hard to leave.

There is another reason the US went to war with Iraq. It is because of oil. The US needs oil to run its country. This is a big reason for many of the decisions made by the government.

I hope the war in Iraq ends soon. I hope there will be peace soon. But it does not seem likely.

I am for gay marriage. I have always been. It is a personal choice, and it is not up to others to decide. 

Research shows that being gay may be in our genes, not just a choice. This means people should not be punished for something they cannot control.

I think it is not fair to deny gay people the right to get married. It is not a government problem, but a personal one. 

In my neighborhood, there are gay couples living like any other family. They walk their dogs and live their lives like everyone else. 

The government should not decide what marriage means. It is up to each person to decide who they love and want to marry. 

Some scientists say that being gay may be caused by a chemical in the brain. It is not just a matter of how people are raised. 

If a man and a woman can get married without anyone knowing, why can't two people of the same sex? It should be a private matter, not a public issue. 

I do not think the government should decide who can get married. It is a personal choice.

When you put something on the internet, it is public. Anyone can see it. You cannot keep it secret. I know this because I am an RA. I have had to deal with this problem before.

When you put something on the internet, it can affect how people think of you. If you talk about something bad, like violence, someone might say something. Then the school might find out about it.

The internet is public. Everyone can see it. If you are friends with someone on Myspace, you will see their bulletin. But it was not the school that saw it. Someone else told the school.

The school has to take action. They cannot ignore it. They do not know if it is a joke or serious. It could be like a science experiment gone wrong. Or it could be very serious.

This happened at my school. Someone overheard someone saying something. They called the school, and we found out who said it. We looked at their Facebook account and saw some things that might be jokes, but became serious.

When you put something on the internet, you cannot be sure who will see it. If you do not want people to see it, do not put it there.

School officials should not be friends with students on Facebook or Myspace. But if a student tells them something, they must act. If there is danger, they must take it seriously.

School officials should not listen to phone conversations or texts. But if someone tells them something, it is different. Teachers should not make fake accounts on Facebook or Myspace to be friends with students. That is not right.

I do not want to know if my residents are doing things they should not do. I do not want to see their pictures on Facebook. I do not want to have to deal with it.

I think the war has gone on too long. 
The original reason was to bring democracy to another country. 
But now, I think we are fighting for the sake of fighting. 
We want to show that we are a powerful country. 
This is not a good reason for a war. 

The conflict began because of George Bush's father and Saddam Hussein. 
But even if our goal was to give democracy to a country with no fair government, that would be a good reason. 
However, personal problems are not a good reason for war. 

I think we made our point early on. 
But the war has lasted for many years. 
This is too long. 

If our goal was to stop a dictator, that would be a good reason for the war. 
But now, our reason for fighting seems unclear. 
It seems like we are fighting because we do not want to stop fighting. 

I think the war has gone on long enough. 
The country we are helping will have to take care of itself soon. 
We have our own problems, like poverty and poor roads. 
We should spend our money on these problems, not on a long war. 

We are spending a lot of money on the war. 
This money could be used for better things, like healthcare and education. 
Our own citizens are being killed in the war, and we are not winning.

I want to ask a question to make things clear.

You see, someone found information on the internet that stopped something bad from happening.  This person looked at a website like Myspace where people put their personal information. If you put something on the internet, it's like sending a message to many people. They can see it.

On Myspace, you need to be a friend with someone to see their information. But if you are their friend, you have given them permission to see your information. So, you have to understand that many people can see what you put on the internet.

If someone saw something on the internet and stopped something bad from happening, that's good. But it's not easy to find that information. You can't have one person looking at everyone's Myspace to stop bad things. That would be unfair to some people.

It's hard to decide if it's right to have someone's job to look at people's Myspace. It depends on why they were looking. Were they looking for something specific or just randomly?

I have a Facebook account, and it bothers me that there are people who can see my information. I know a person on TV showed how easy it is to get information from the internet. He got someone's screen name and talked to her on instant messenger. I wouldn't meet someone like that, but I have had people in my class who know my screen name and contact me.

It's hard to control what you put on the internet. You want to be able to communicate with friends, but you also don't want strangers to see your information. I try to limit what I put on Facebook, but it's hard.

My roommate told me that her high school banned students from having Myspace. I'm not sure if that's right. Can the school tell students what they can and can't do on the internet?

The Iraq War is a big problem. I want to talk about it. I feel strange saying I was against it from the beginning. Most people in the world think it was a bad idea. 

Polls show the same thing. Most people in the United States, Iraq, and all over the world think it was a bad idea. Even most of the U.S. troops in Iraq think it was a bad idea. They want to leave within a year.

The Iraq War has been a disaster since the beginning. It was already a problem before the U.S. got involved. Now, leaving will also be difficult. There is a big cultural difference between the United States and the Middle East. It is hard for the U.S. government to understand and fix this problem.

The U.S. government wanted to bring democracy to Iraq, but this is not what the Iraqis wanted. Saddam Hussein was a bad man, but the U.S. should have thought about the pros and cons before invading Iraq.

I do not think it is good for the U.S. to stay in Iraq. The administration may have some ideas for why we should stay, but I do not agree. If we leave slowly, that is okay. But, I do not see a good reason for us to stay in Iraq.

Most Iraqis think the U.S. should leave within a year. If we ask them, they will say what they want. If something goes wrong, we can say it is not our fault. We will be the good guys if we leave now. At least we will be better than we are now.

There is still a problem with men and women being treated unfairly in the United States. This problem exists in many areas of work.

Not just for women, but also for men. The kind of work a person does affects how they are treated. In some areas, women have a harder time getting ahead. This is because of a idea that men are usually in charge. But this is not always true.

Even if a woman has the qualifications and skills for a job, she may not be chosen for it. This is because of how people think women should be treated. But it's not just women who face this problem.

Men also face issues. For example, in the fashion industry, men who are interested in fashion are often not taken seriously. This is because people think men who like fashion are not 'normal'. But this is changing.

Some men are now staying home to take care of their children, which is not common. People often look down on them because they think men should be the ones working to make money. But this is not always true.

Change is slow. But we are making progress. More women are becoming leaders and getting accepted in business. This is a good thing.

We need to show the good qualities of people who are often treated unfairly. We should not force people to accept change, but let them see the good things about these individuals. This way, people will be more likely to accept them.

We have made a lot of progress, but change takes time. We should be patient and continue to work towards making things fairer. We are at a good point now, where people are starting to accept change.

Other problems exist, like people being treated unfairly because of where they are from or how they speak. This is another example of how people are treated unfairly because of how they are different.

My understanding is that marijuana was not made legal.  It was decriminalized.  This means it is no longer a serious crime.  Instead, it is like getting a traffic ticket.  You get in trouble, but not arrested.

If you get a marijuana ticket, it can affect your life.  It can affect your job or how you look in front of a judge.  Usually, having a drug charge is bad.  But when something is decriminalized, these bad effects are not as bad.

Some people think decriminalizing marijuana is not a good idea.  They think it costs too much money to arrest and put people in jail.  It also costs money to go to court.  But some places are willing to make this change.  They think it will save money.

In Denver, people are more open-minded.  They think it is okay to decriminalize marijuana.  This city has more money now to help people.  They can spend it on education, food for the homeless, and other important things.

I think it's good to decriminalize marijuana.  It's not good to have it just anywhere.  There are many reasons for this.  One reason is money.  Another reason is that some people might smoke and drive.  This is not good.  Many people think smoking marijuana is taboo.  We should not have it in public.

Alcohol can be bad for people.  It can affect their driving.  But marijuana can affect how people live their lives.  Some people can use it and be fine.  Others cannot.  It depends on the person.

We cannot say that one substance is always bad.  Everyone reacts differently.  Some people can control themselves.  Others cannot.  We should be careful when we talk about substances.

I agree. 
There are good reasons for the Catholic Church's old customs. 
They do many things the same way for a long time. 
This is good because it shows respect for tradition. 
However, it is also important to be flexible and change when necessary.

The Catholic Church says its followers must go to church every week. 
They have rules for everything. 
Sometimes, it seems like the Church does not accept people who do not follow the rules perfectly. 
It also does not accept people of other religions. 
For example, my mom was an Episcopalian and my dad was an Episcopalian. 
The Catholic Church would not marry us because my dad was not Catholic.

This is not showing love and acceptance of others. 
The Catholic Church says to love others, but it does not act that way. 
Many Catholic rules tell people to do one thing, but the Church does not follow those rules.

I do not think allowing priests to be married would stop them from doing bad things. 
People who hurt children will do it anyway. 
They are hurting children, not grown-ups. 
So, marriage or not, they will still hurt children. 
I do not think allowing priests to be married would make a difference.

I am not sure about this issue. I do not know if one side is right and the other is wrong. This is a very difficult topic. It is hard to decide without hurting anyone's feelings.

The separation of church and state is a big problem. Defining marriage is also hard. Some people think marriage is between a man and a woman. Others think it is between two people who love each other.

If marriage is a sacrament, the government should not make rules about it. But if marriage is not a sacrament, the government should give tax breaks to married couples.

I think marriage should be considered a civil union. It is two people who love each other. The government should not worry about what kind of marriage it is.

If all the states agree on this issue, the government should make it a federal law. But a constitutional amendment to ban gay marriage is not a good idea. It is not important enough to change the constitution.

In simple words, we should not change the constitution to ban gay marriage. Two people who love each other should have the same rights as anyone else.

I was raised in a Christian home. But I have friends who are gay. This makes the issue of homosexuality unclear for me. I do not agree with every aspect of the gay lifestyle. However, I think it should be legal. It is not a matter for the whole country. Each state should decide for itself.

Some states are democratic, and some are Republican. Democratic states usually support gay marriage. If you choose to live in a state that allows gay marriage, it is your choice. If the state decides to make gay marriage legal, you should accept the decision. This is because you chose to live there.

I think homosexuals should have the same rights as heterosexuals. So, each state should decide whether to make gay marriage legal.

I already said this. But I want to say it again. The president should not decide for the whole country. Each state should make its own decision.

George Bush is against gay marriage. But he cannot decide for all the states. He does not live in every state. It is not his decision to make.

Some things should be decided by each state. The president will not be in office forever. If a new president wants to change the law, it will just go back and forth. Each state should make its own decision. They will have to live with the result.

Myspace is a public website. If you post something on it, everyone can see it. School officials have the right to see it because they can access it from their homes. 

Imagine someone is posting something on Myspace that could cause a school shooting. School officials should be able to see that to prevent it. They have a responsibility to make sure the school is safe.

School officials might go on the internet to see if students are doing things they shouldn't be doing. They do this to keep the school safe. Some people think this is an invasion of privacy. But I don't think so. If it helps keep the school safe, it's okay.

It's easier to express yourself when you write. But on Myspace, everything you post is public. It's not a good idea to say things you don't want others to see. Once you post something on the internet, it's there forever.

School officials should not just go on the internet to catch students. But if they have a good reason, like to make the school safer, it's okay. When parents drop off their children at school, they expect it to be a safe place. School officials have a responsibility to make that happen.

The school had to prepare for emergencies, like school shootings, by doing drills. This is to keep the school safe. School officials were doing the same thing in this case. They were trying to prevent bad things from happening.

The purpose of the school officials going on the internet was to make the school a safer place. They wanted to prevent something like the Columbine school shooting from happening.

I was for the war at first. It was because I was affected by 9/11. I wanted to fight back. But then I thought about it more. I realized we were not ready for war. We did not have a plan. We just went in without thinking about the long-term effects.

I think we made a mistake. Going to war was not the right decision. The people in that country are fighting each other. They cannot fight us if they are busy fighting themselves. Our being there is not helping. 

I do not care about what happens in that country anymore. They are not like us. They fight in a different way. It is not like our war. They are not trying to make their country better. They just want us to leave.

I think we were not thinking clearly. We were angry and wanted revenge. President Bush declared war on Iraq. I understand why he did it. The people wanted to fight back. But we did not plan well. We did not know what to do when we got there.

We should have made a better plan. We should have thought about what would happen after the war. We did not have unity. We did not know what we were doing. That would have helped us.

I do not think we can change those people. They are always going to be like that. 

We are not making progress. We made some progress, but not enough. I think we should leave. Once we leave, their country will fall apart. We cannot stay there forever. We are hurting ourselves by staying. We should just leave.
